org.testsuite.core

Class TestCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testsuite.core.TestCore

  • public class TestCore
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the management of tests. It is read in the configuration file. If no error has occurred, the individual tests are performed. Finally, an HTML page is embarrassed, in which the results of each test are summarized.
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Ren√© Majewski
